A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I look at The Last Jedi as Star Wars episode 8\, which it is\, there are so many problems with this movie. It ignores a lot of things previously established in the Star Wars lore\, Rose and Holdo have got to be two of the worst characters I have ever seen\, and it acts as if The Force Awakens never existed. Rian Johnson seemed to just forget that he was making a sequel and went off to do his own thing. As a Star Wars fan\, this movie was just awful.
